vernac_cmds: Lemma modus_ponens_wand' {A}{ND: NatDed A}{SL: SepLog A}: forall P P' Q: A, P |-- P' -> derives (sepcon P (wand P' Q)) Q.
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [ | apply derives_refl] | apply modus_ponens_wand ].
Lemma solve: forall g l g' l' F, g |-- l * F -> F * l' |-- g' -> g |-- l * (l' -* g').
Lemma weak_ramif_spec: forall g l g' l', g |-- l * (l' -* g') -> g |-- l * TT.
Lemma trans: forall g m l g' m' l', g |-- m * (m' -* g') -> m |-- l * (l' -* m') -> g |-- l * (l' -* g').
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [exact H0 | apply derives_refl] |].
Lemma trans': forall (m l g' m' l': A), m |-- l * (l' -* m') -> m * (m' -* g') |-- l * (l' -* g').
Lemma trans'': forall (p g' m' l': A), p |-- l' -* m' -> p * (m' -* g') |-- (l' -* g').
rewrite (sepcon_assoc l1), <- (sepcon_assoc l2), (sepcon_comm l2), (sepcon_assoc _ l2), <- (sepcon_assoc l1).
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply wand_sepcon_wand | apply derives_refl] |].
Lemma frame: forall g l g' l' F, g |-- l * (l' -* g') -> g * F |-- l * (l' -* g' * F).
Lemma frame_post: forall g l g' l' F, g |-- l * (l' -* g') -> g |-- l * (l' * F -* g' * F).
apply sepcon_derives; [rewrite sepcon_comm; apply modus_ponens_wand | auto].
Lemma frame_pre: forall g l g' l' F, g |-- l * (l' -* g') -> g * F |-- (l * F) * (l' -* g').
Lemma exp_right: forall {T} (a: T) g l g' l', g |-- l * (l' -* g' a) -> g |-- l * (l' -* exp g').
apply solve with (l' -* g' a); auto.
Lemma reduce: forall {B} g l (g' l': B -> A), g |-- l * (allp (l' -* g')) -> g |-- l * (exp l' -* exp g').
apply exp_left; intro x; apply (exp_right x).
Lemma solve: forall {B} g l g' l' F, g |-- l * F -> (forall x: B, F * l' x |-- g' x) -> g |-- l * (allp (l' -* g')).
Lemma weak_ramif_spec: forall {B} g l (g' l': B -> A), g |-- l * allp (l' -* g') -> g |-- l * TT.
Lemma plain_spec: forall {B} g l g' l' (x: B), g |-- l * (allp (l' -* g')) -> g |-- l * (l' x -* g' x).

Lemma trans: forall {B BG BL} g m l g' mG' mL' l' (fG: B -> BG) (fL: B -> BL), (forall b, mL' (fL b) |-- mG' (fG b)) -> g |-- m * allp (mG' -* g') -> m |-- l * allp (l' -* mL') -> g |-- l * allp (Basics.compose l' fL -* Basics.compose g' fG).
apply solve with (allp (l' -* mL') * allp (mG' -* g')); auto.
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [exact H1 | apply derives_refl] |].
Lemma simple_trans: forall {B} g m l (g' m' l': B -> A), g |-- m * allp (m' -* g') -> m |-- l * allp (l' -* m') -> g |-- l * allp (l' -* g').
eapply trans with (mL' := m') (mG' := m') (fL := id B) (fG := id B); eauto.
Lemma trans'': forall {CS: ClassicalSep A} {B C: Type} (f: B->C) p l m g1 g2, g2 = g1 oo f -> p |-- allp (l -* m oo f) -> p * allp (m -* g1) |-- allp (l -* g2).
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply H0 | apply derives_refl] | ].
Lemma split: forall {B} g1 g2 l1 l2 (g1' g2' l1' l2': B -> A), g1 |-- l1 * allp (l1' -* g1') -> g2 |-- l2 * allp (l2' -* g2') -> g1 * g2 |-- (l1 * l2) * allp (l1' * l2' -* g1' * g2').
apply solve with (allp (l1' -* g1') * allp (l2' -* g2')).
rewrite (sepcon_assoc l1), <- (sepcon_assoc l2), (sepcon_comm l2), (sepcon_assoc _ l2), <- (sepcon_assoc l1).
change ((l1' * l2') x) with (l1' x * l2' x).
rewrite <- (sepcon_assoc _ (l1' x)), (sepcon_assoc _ _ (l1' x)), (sepcon_comm _ (l1' x)), <- (sepcon_assoc _ (l1' x)), (sepcon_assoc _ _ (l2' x)).
Lemma frame: forall {B} g l (g' l': B -> A) F, g |-- l * allp (l' -* g') -> g * F |-- l * allp (l' -* g' * Basics.const F).
Lemma frame_post: forall {B} g l (g' l' F: B -> A), g |-- l * allp (l' -* g') -> g |-- l * allp (l' * F -* g' * F).
Lemma frame_pre: forall {B} g l (g' l': B -> A) F, g |-- l * allp (l' -* g') -> g * F |-- (l * F) * allp (l' -* g').
Lemma exp_right: forall {T B} (a: B -> T) g l (g': T -> B -> A) (l': B -> A), g |-- l * allp (l' -* (fun b => g' (a b) b)) -> g |-- l * allp (l' -* exp g').
apply solve with (allp (l' -* (fun b => g' (a b) b))); auto.

Ltac formalize := match goal with | |- @derives ?Pred _ ?g (?l * @allp ?Pred _ ?T ?Func) => let g' := fresh "g'" in evar (g': T -> Pred); let l' := fresh "l'" in evar (l': T -> Pred); let x := fresh "x" in let H := fresh "H" in assert (Func = l' -* g') as H; [ extensionality x; cbv beta; match goal with | |- ?L' -* exp ?G' = _ => super_pattern L' x; super_pattern_in_func G' x | |- ?L' -* ?G' = _ => super_pattern L' x; super_pattern G' x end; match goal with | |- ?L' _ -* exp (fun a => ?G' a _) = _ => instantiate (1 := L') in (Value of l'); instantiate (1 := exp G') in (Value of g') | |- ?L' _ -* ?G' _ = _ => instantiate (1 := L') in (Value of l'); instantiate (1 := G') in (Value of g') end; subst g' l'; reflexivity | subst g' l'; rewrite H; clear H] end.
Lemma reduce: forall {B} g l p (g' l': B -> A), corable p -> g |-- l * (allp (p --> (l' -* g'))) -> g |-- l * (exp (p && l') -* exp (p && g')).
apply exp_left; intro x; apply (exp_right x).
Lemma solve: forall {B} g l p g' l' F, corable p -> g |-- l * F -> (forall x: B, (p x) && (F * l' x) |-- g' x) -> g |-- l * (allp (p --> (l' -* g'))).
Lemma weak_ramif_spec: forall {B} g l p (g' l': B -> A), g |-- l * allp (p --> l' -* g') -> g |-- l * TT.
Lemma plain_spec: forall {B} g l p g' l' (x: B), corable p -> g |-- p x -> g |-- l * allp (p --> (l' -* g')) -> g |-- l * (l' x -* g' x).

Lemma trans: forall {B BG BL} g m l p pG pL g' mG' mL' l' (fG: B -> BG) (fL: B -> BL), corable p -> corable pL -> corable pG -> g |-- m * allp (pG --> (mG' -* g')) -> m |-- l * allp (pL --> (l' -* mL')) -> (forall b, p b |-- pL (fL b)) -> (forall b, p b && mL' (fL b) |-- pG (fG b) && mG' (fG b)) -> g |-- l * allp (p --> (Basics.compose l' fL -* Basics.compose g' fG)).
apply solve with (allp (pL --> (l' -* mL')) * allp (pG --> (mG' -* g'))).
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [exact H3 | apply derives_refl] |].
apply derives_trans with (pG (fG b) && mG' (fG b)).
apply derives_trans with (p b && mL' (fL b)); [| apply H5].

Lemma split: forall {B} g1 g2 l1 l2 (p g1' g2' l1' l2': B -> A), (forall x: B, corable (p x)) -> g1 |-- l1 * allp (p --> (l1' -* g1')) -> g2 |-- l2 * allp (p --> (l2' -* g2')) -> g1 * g2 |-- (l1 * l2) * allp (p --> (l1' * l2' -* g1' * g2')).
apply solve with (allp (p --> (l1' -* g1')) * allp (p --> (l2' -* g2'))).
rewrite (sepcon_assoc l1), <- (sepcon_assoc l2), (sepcon_comm l2), (sepcon_assoc _ l2), <- (sepcon_assoc l1).
change ((l1' * l2') x) with (l1' x * l2' x).
rewrite <- (sepcon_assoc _ (l1' x)), (sepcon_assoc _ _ (l1' x)), (sepcon_comm _ (l1' x)), <- (sepcon_assoc _ (l1' x)), (sepcon_assoc _ _ (l2' x)).
(eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [simpl; intros; apply modus_ponens | apply derives_refl] |]).
(eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [simpl; intros; apply modus_ponens | apply derives_refl] |]).
Lemma frame: forall {B} g l p g' l' F, (forall x: B, corable (p x)) -> g |-- l * allp (p --> (l' -* g')) -> g * F |-- l * allp (p --> (l' -* g' * Basics.const F)).
rewrite andp_comm; apply imp_andp_adjoint; apply (allp_left _ x); apply imp_andp_adjoint.
Lemma frame_post: forall {B} g l (p g' l' F: B -> A), (forall x: B, corable (p x)) -> g |-- l * allp (p --> (l' -* g')) -> g |-- l * allp (p --> (l' * F -* g' * F)).
rewrite andp_comm; apply imp_andp_adjoint; apply (allp_left _ x); apply imp_andp_adjoint.
Lemma frame_pre: forall {B} g l (p g' l': B -> A) F, (forall x: B, corable (p x)) -> g |-- l * allp (p --> (l' -* g')) -> g * F |-- (l * F) * allp (p --> (l' -* g')).
rewrite andp_comm; apply imp_andp_adjoint; apply (allp_left _ x); apply imp_andp_adjoint.
Lemma exp_right: forall {T B} (a: B -> T) p g l (g': T -> B -> A) (l': B -> A), corable p -> g |-- l * allp (p --> (l' -* (fun b => g' (a b) b))) -> g |-- l * allp (p --> (l' -* exp g')).
apply solve with (allp (p --> (l' -* (fun b => g' (a b) b)))); auto.
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply modus_ponens | apply derives_refl] |].

Ltac formalize := match goal with | |- @derives ?Pred _ ?g (?l * @allp ?Pred _ ?T ?Func) => let p := fresh "p" in evar (p: T -> Pred); let g' := fresh "g'" in evar (g': T -> Pred); let l' := fresh "l'" in evar (l': T -> Pred); let x := fresh "x" in let H := fresh "H" in assert (Func = p --> (l' -* g')); [ extensionality x; cbv beta; match goal with | |- ?P --> (?L' -* exp ?G') = _ => super_pattern P x; super_pattern L' x; super_pattern_in_func G' x | |- ?P --> (?L' -* ?G') = _ => super_pattern P x; super_pattern L' x; super_pattern G' x end; match goal with | |- ?P _ --> (?L' _ -* exp (fun a => ?G' a _)) = _ => instantiate (1 := P) in (Value of p); instantiate (1 := L') in (Value of l'); instantiate (1 := exp G') in (Value of g') | |- ?P _ --> (?L' _ -* ?G' _) = _ => instantiate (1 := P) in (Value of p); instantiate (1 := L') in (Value of l'); instantiate (1 := G') in (Value of g') end; subst p g' l'; reflexivity | subst p g' l'; rewrite H; clear H] end.

command: eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [ | apply derives_refl] | apply modus_ponens_wand ].
rewrite (sepcon_assoc l1), <- (sepcon_assoc l2), (sepcon_comm l2), (sepcon_assoc _ l2), <- (sepcon_assoc l1).
eapply derives_trans; [apply sepcon_derives; [apply wand_sepcon_wand | apply derives_refl] |].
apply sepcon_derives; [rewrite sepcon_comm; apply modus_ponens_wand | auto].
apply solve with (l' -* g' a); auto.
apply exp_left; intro x; apply (exp_right x).
eapply trans with (mL' := m') (mG' := m') (fL := id B) (fG := id B); eauto.
